Package ix.applet

Support for I-P2 applets.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AppletCommunicationStrategy Lets I-P2 applets talk with each other.
AppletCommunicationTool The user interface to an AppletCommunicationStrategy.
AppletCommunicationTool.Controller A ToolController for an AppletCommunicationTool.
AppletMessage Wrapper for messages between applets.
CGIRelay Passes messages between an AppletCommunicationStrategy and a MessageServer.
CGIServerStatus  
MessageMemory  
MessageServer Handles messages for an AppletCommunicationStrategy.
MessageServer.Strategy A communication strategy used by both the message-server and its clients.
 

Exception Summary
AppletCommunicationStrategy.ConnectFailure  
 

Package ix.applet Description

Support for I-P2 applets.
